text: It ’ s the Heart of Gold into the dim granular darkness of the Dust Cloud there has never been anything to see in the sky. #Twitter

passages.fragment: It ’ s the Heart of Gold
passages.full_quote: <used>It ’ s the Heart of Gold</used>, Arthur

passages.fragment: the Heart of Gold into the dim granular darkness of the Dust Cloud
passages.full_quote: They glanced at each other, and then stepped out, improbably, along the shaft of light which streamed out of the open hatchway of <used>the Heart of Gold into the dim granular darkness of the Dust Cloud</used>

passages.fragment: of the Dust Cloud there has never been anything to see in the sky
passages.full_quote: Because <used>of the Dust Cloud there has never been anything to see in the sky</used>
